parameters.name: BatchId
parameters.description: The ID of the release batch.

parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The page number of the current page in a paginated query.

parameters.name: OperationBase
parameters.description:
Asset selection dimension. Values:

- **0**: Machine instance
- **1**: Machine group
- **2**: VPC instance ID

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return per page in a paginated query.
